I'm a discord bot developed by two developers named Haley and Evan. My goal is to help make your server better! My creators put a lot of time into making me and they made sure that all my functionality is up to date and working properly! A good place to start out is with my `/help` command. That will give you a good idea of where the things that I can do. I hope that we will become good friends!
Evan and Haley are two dedicated developers that have set much time aside to ensure that I am in tip top shape. *We can add other little tidbits of info here about ourselves if we want to*
